p: The liver biopsies of the rats were fixed in 10 % formalin, dehydrated in graded alcohol, and then embedded in paraffin wax. The paraffin-embedded tissue was sectioned (5 μm) serially using SPINCON rotary microtome (model number SP‐1120/SP‐1120A). The sections were distributed on albumin coated sterilized glass slides, stretched and stained with hematoxylin and eosin (H&E) dyes [ 36]. The slides containing tissue sections stained with H&E were observed under a light microscope at ×40 magnification after being mounted using dibutylphthalate polystyrene xylene (DPX).
